lines.text: Cheer up, buddy! We're in Vegas. This is the land of ladies, luck and liquor.And don't forget losers.

[describing her adult movie career]
I can't wait till my next movie. And who knows, maybe this time I'll even have some dialog.
You're gonna make me a star, aren't you? A *big* star.
Oh yeah, baby, you're going to be big, bigger than my cock.
